institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 7 (Notice of selection of project group, etc.)
contents: Article 7 (Notice of selection of business group, etc.) ① The chairman of the board shall select the business group through a public offering process. ② Cooperatives and organizations may participate in the project as organizations under each subparagraph of Article 21 (1) of the Enforcement Decree of the Worker Vocational Competency Development Act (excluding universities under Article 4) or as cooperatives or organizations in the relevant industrial field., ③ Joint The training center is an institution that falls under any of the following items and can participate in projects together with cooperatives and organizations. 1. Companies subscribed to employment insurance in accordance with Article 8 of the 「Employment Insurance Act」 and Article 5 of the 「Act on Premium Collection, etc. of Employment Insurance and Industrial Accident Compensation Insurance」, 2. Employers' organizations and their associations, 3. 「Higher Education Act」 4. Universities and junior colleges under the 「Act on the Management of Public Institutions」 (excluding the Open University, College of Communications, Open University and Cyber ​​University), 4. Institutions with experience in conducting training projects among public institutions under the 「Act on the Management of Public Institutions」, 5. 「 Public vocational training facilities in accordance with the Worker Vocational Competency Development Act, 6. Non-profit organizations with public interest and expertise
